description.full: In Jeremy McGrath’s Offroad, players race four-wheeled 800 horsepower off road race trucks with tons of options including a host of tracks, single-player and multiplayer modes as well as a wide loadout of vehicle classes including Rally Cars, Pro Buggies, and Trophylite Trucks, all in crispy 1080p, 60 frames per second presentation. With multiplayer support for eight racers and a full career mode, Jeremy McGrath’s Offroad will be the title for racing fans who want to get down and dirty on the track!
description.short: Jeremy McGrath’s Offroad is a white-knuckle, high-flying racer featuring the fastest and most furious four-wheeled off-road action this side of a real track. With multiplayer support for eight racers and a full career mode, Jeremy McGrath’s Offroad is the definitive title for racing fans who want to get down and dirty!
